snippet.title: Copts and Robbers for the Apple II
snippet.description:
Are you sad that there isn't the famous Atari 2600 game "Adventure" on the Apple II?

Well, guess what! There actually is....well, kinda.

Sadly, while Adventure is insanely fun (and innovative for its time), Copts and Robbers isn't. It's far away from the fun Adventure has to offer.

Non-smooth and bad control sheme and you have no idea where the damn vault is. Well, there aren't more bad things in this game, but those things can ruin a game already somewhat.
